en-US.summary: Retrieve the latest info on Stellar Lumens from coinmarketcap.com.
examplePhrases: What is the lumen price in dollars?
What is the lumen price in bitcoin?
en-US.name: Lumen Price
en-US.description:
Ask for the current Lumen Price, and retrieve the latest info from coinmarketcap.com.

Lumen price will keep you upto date about your favorite cryptocurrency Stellar Lumens.

To start, just say "Alexa, start Lumen Price" or "Alexa, what is the lumen price?" or "Alexa, what is the lumen price in dollars?" or "Alexa, what is the lumen price in bitcoin?" to get the current price.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop" 

Feel Free to donate lumen on: GC42ZJ532XH653ZRKCDISBTWOKR3FQ7UCQAQ7XWYZ4FHIRRCXTQKE5PA

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: To test the app just use the intents.
